FUSION_Plugins.description: Segmentation plugin for cortical interstitium, medullary interstitium, Glomeruli, Sclerotic Glomeruli, tubules, and Arteries/Arterioles
Spot annotation generation plugin adding main cell types, subtypes, cell states, and UMI counts to spots
Aggregation of spot properties to intersecting structures
Feature extraction for sub-compartment specific features
Grab morphometrics and cell composition data for structures in current visualization dataset
Calculating cluster markers for selected features using Seurat
